text: Rigney is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. == Sights == * Chateau of La Roche * Church of Saints Peter and Paul Rigney, le château de la Roche.jpg|Chateau of La Roche Eglise Saint- Pierre et Saint-Paul de Rigney (2).jpg|Church of Saints Peter and Paul == References == Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Rigney
